column4: hi can anyone help with workgroups/samba? I installed initially kde but switched to gnome desktop as some things were not working but since then I cannot see the workgroup from my xbox or windows laptops
is samba running?
as far as i know, yes
status activated in gadmin
can you pastebin the smb.conf file?
pastebin, not dcc send
CHUCKF: did you get it?
<chuckf: I'm using xchat-gnome and see no option to pastebin
try here now http://pastebin.com/m2a241e32
and this same conf file was working before?
yes I have not changed anything
does your log file show any errors?
there is no log file in the etc/samba folder do you mean somewhere else?
in /var/log/samba
http://pastebin.com/m74e90498 I appended it to the conf
from line 148
I'm only seeing through line 146
try this one http://pastebin.com/m479bb976
the file looks right. I'm thinking that maybe there's a firewall setting or something in the network setup
I'm trying to access the shares from an original xbox through xbmc there is no firewall and it did work fine with KDE
are the ports open on the samba server?
yes
